title: Beautiful art Museum
text: The building is amazing on the outside and the inside. They have a good collection of paintings and sculptures. It is not too big to be overwhelming and not to small. It took us about 90 minutes. It was good to visit on our last day before heading to airport.

title: Beautiful Architecture
text: From the outside the building does not look very nice, but the inside is very nice. The architecture and marble work is wonderful.

title: Nice Site
text: the Hemiciclo a Juarez is a nice site. It is located in the park and good place to see. It is a very short visit.

title: Nice architecture
text: The entrance has a beautiful fountain. The exhibits are quite nice. Some of the main topicA are described in English but most other descriptions and signs are in Spanish. So you should get the English audio if you want to really learn.

title: Great Ramen. They are fast.
text: Great Ramen. They are fast. Food is great. Always a wait. They don’t take cash, which is fine with me.

title: Great Setting, Poor Service and Food
text:
Match has a great patio next to the Chief. The setting is very nice. But the service was very poor and the food very greasy.

It took them over almost an hour before they got our food. The server did not even check on us. When we asked when we can expect our food, she said you got here with a bunch of other tables. So the kitchen is backed up. Whereas, when we got there there were only a couple of other tables and they already had their food. All the other tables that got there after we did got their food at about the same time as we did, even though they got there anywhere from 20 to 40 minutes after we got there.

title: Nice bridge
text: It connects the Karakoy area to the Kadikoy area. There are lots of restaurants under the bridge and it gets busy. It's nice to walk across the bridge.

title: Good lively atmosphere
text: Joey has great service and great atmosphere. Food is good and good selection of drinks. Highly recommended.

title: Great for Happy Hour
text: They have a great happy hour for food and drinks. Good selection and good value. Highly recommenced.

title: Over Rated
text: Bridges has a great deck/patio on a nice day. But the food and service are not what they used to be. It now really targets tourists. Food is over priced.

title: Great view of the Grand Canyon from the sky
text: We did the extended tour. 5 Star picked us up from our hotel and took us to the airport at Boulder City where they fly from and dropped us at the hotel after we were done. Our pilot was great. The flight is about 1.5 hours return. The ride from the strip to Boulder City is about 30 to 45 minutes depending how many pick ups they have. We had six passengers in the helicopter. 4 in the back and 2 in the front next to the pilot. Front seats are much better.
place: Extended Grand Canyon West Rim Air-Only Helicopter Tour

title: Nice view of downtown & mountains
text: QE Park is just outside of the downtown core. It is quite nice and has a great view of the downtown and mountains. There is a restaurant on top with a great view.

title: Native Totem Poles
text: These totem poles at Brockton Point are one of the sites to see in Stanley Park. It does not take long to visit them. They were made by BC's aboriginal people. There are 9 totem poles from different bands.

title: Salt Water Pool
text: Kits pool is a large salt water pool. It is a great place on a not summer day. It can get busy but is on the beach.

title: Beautiful Campus
text: UBC has one of the most beautiful university campuses. Nice view of the ocean and north shore mountains. A mix of new and old buildings. Near beaches and the Mu sum of Anthropology.

title: Great Beach
text: Spanish Banks are great beach near Point Grey. Good place to play beach volleyball and BBQ.The beach is wide and long and depending on tide level you could walk all way into the ocean.

title: Good Way to Get to Granville Island from Downtown
text: the ferries are a great way to get to Granville Island from Downtown Vancouver. It's a short ride but you can also stay on and go to different stops along the way.

title: Vancouver's largest park
text: Pacific Spirit Park is bigger than Stanley Park. Lots of good easy hiking trails. Close to the beach at one end and near UBC.

title: Oldest Part of Vancouver
text: Gastown is the oldest part of the City of Vancouver. It has old buildings and cobble stone roads. There are lots of restaurants and pubs. Lots of chic boutiques too. More and more buildings are getting renovated. So, you could see some homeless people in the outskirts.

title: Nice view of Acropolis
text: the hill is in a nice park across from the Acropolis. If you go there in the evening, you can see the sun set from the top and a nice view of Athens. You can also see the lights on the Acropolis.

title: Get there early
text: We visited in early June. It gets hot very quickly. So, it is best to get there as early as possible.

title: A must see
text: When in Athens, you must see the Acropolis. The best time to go is early in the morning. Try and be there as soon as it opens. We were there around 9 am and by 10 it was getting very hot. This was in early June.

title: Where the locals go
text: This is a great restaurant where the locals go to eat. It is a a little away from the all the touristy areas, but the food and service are excellent and good value.

title: Fantastic Private Tour
text:
My wife and I had a private one day tour of Istanbul with Istanbuilte. Our guide and Instanbulite manager was great. We bypassed the lines and she gave us enough of the history. At the Grand Bazar, she took us to her trusted shops. She even took us to the Spice Market, since we wanted to buy some Turkish coffee. She even recommended and made reservations for us at some restaurants for dinner.

Very good. Highly recommended.

title: Great architecture
text: It is large and busy. Best to go early in the morning. Outside is not that impressive but inside is very nice.

title: Historic Mosque
text: It is busy. Best to go early in the morning. Best to dress modestly but they offer free head covers and long skirts.

title: Interesting history
text: It is dark inside and tough to take pictures. The history is interesting. It is quite interesting how it was used.

title: Tourist District
text: The area is close to all the main tourist attractions. All are within walking distance. The restaurants are ok but not authentic. I would suggest going accross the Galata Bridge for better food.

title: Take the ferry tour
text: I would recommend taking the tour offered by the ferry company rather than the private tours. It is cheaper and just as good. Takes 1.5 hours.

title: Limited beer selection
text: Went there with some friends. For a pub/taphouse they have limited number of beers on tap. Good 80s music though.

title: Good Breakfast
text: I had breakfast there, while staying at the hotel. The continental buffet is reasonably priced and quite good.

title: Excellent Food and Service
text:
I went there for dinner on a recent business trip. The service was excellent. Our server was excellent and very attentive. The food was fantastic. I had the goat. It was the first time I had goat. It was very good.
A little pricey.

title: Amazing Antelope Canyon
text:
We went to the Lower Antelope Canyon. Scott was our tour guide. He was great! He knew where to take pictures for great results.

Antelope Canyon is amazing! Highly recommended.
place: Antelope Canyon Tours by Roger Ekis

title: Great View
text:
Very nice view. It is a short easy walk from the parking lot to the view point. It is sandy, but an easy walk. Wear comfortable shows.

View is amazing.

title: Amazing
text: Very nice view. The way the lights shine in is amazing. Put your camera on Chrome filter for best lighting results.

title: Great Hotel
text: I stayed at the Best Western Premier Denham Inn & Suites for one night. I found the staff to be very friendly and helpful . I received a complimentary upgrade. The room was clean with modern decor. Breakfast was included and good. I would certainly stay at this Best Western Hotel again.
place: Best Western Premier Denham Inn & Suites

title: Beautiful View
text:
Poet's Cove Resort is a very nice resort. We stayed in a lodge room, but they also have 2 and 3 bedroom cottages. all with very nice water views of the marina.

Service was very good. Mary at front desk was very nice. We asked for a late check out and she was able to accommodate us. Kale at the front desk was also very good. We asked where we could go in the ocean and he gave us directions to a secluded beach near the hotel.

title: Great Setting
text:
Good food and nice view.
Syrens has a nice outdoor patio with water views. Food is good. I had the BBQ for Canada day and my wife had the seafood linguine. both very good. I really liked the potato salad. It was with mustard and not mayo.

title: Great Food
text: Probably the best restaurant on the island. Great Sangria. We had dinner there one night and breakfast another day. both very good. Dinner special was 2 full racks of ribs for 2 for $30.

title: Good Nachos, poor service
text:
nachos were very good. service was poor. We sat down for 20 minutes before someone came to serve us. We had to get our own menus. The server came by to the table next to us several times and would not even look at us to see if wanted anything. Asked him for menus and he said he'd be with us and never came back.

Nice view from the deck.

title: Incredible View from the Top
text: Mount Norman is one of the nighest points on Pender Island. The hike from Ainsile Point side is quite steep but only takes about 30 minutes. The view from the top is incredible.

title: Smooth Flight
text: Nice smooth flight. Nothing out of the ordinary. on time departure and arrival. the touch screen on the personal entertainment system was not the greatest.

title: Nice Hotel
text:
The BW Camrose is probably the best hotel in town. They offer free wings and beer on Wednesday and Tuesday evening. They also offer buffet breakfast included in the rate. Basic breakfast but ok. Scrambled eggs, bacon, french toast, and cereal.

small but decent gym. small pool.
place: Hotel Camrose Resort Casino, BW Premier Collection

title: Basic Restaurant
text: food is ok and so is the service. I had the steak Neptune, but it was ok,. Not as good as I expected.

title: Amazing Site
text:
It is a very nice hike up to the very top. Most of the hick is relatively easy, but there are some parts where it gets pretty steep and you have to climb up or come down on your butt, but these are very short (a few steps). The view at the top is amazing.

I went in December. It can get chilly and windy at the top, but could get warm when you are climbing up. Make sure you layer.

Make sure you have good hiking boots.

title: Starbucks
text: It's a Starbucks. You get what you expect. Fast and friendly service. Clean coffee shop. Reliable wifi.

title: Great Food - Farm to Table
text:
The food and service were great. This is a farm to table restaurant. We were there first week of Dec. They had some seasonal items on the menu. The waitress was very friendly and asked for our feedback on how everything tasted so they can improve.

Nice casual setting.

title: Nice Room & Hotel - Noisy AC
text:
The room was nice and clean. We were on the ground floor, so close to the parking and a few steps from the pool.

The Air Conditioning unit was very noisy, which made it difficult to get a good night sleep.

Had breakfast at the restaurant. I had the buffet, which consisted of eggs, sausages, bacon, fruit, cereal, and pastries. Pretty basic but it was good. You could also order an omelette and different style of eggs, which they would make specifically for you.

Pool is nice and not busy.

Hotel is close to the highway, but not much else around there.

title: Good Food and Beer
text:
Good pastys and beer.

Casual pub type of restaurant.

the pasties are quite filling.

reasonably priced.

title: Good Service
text: Good service, comfortable seats, good food. Much better than regular airline food. complimentary wine.

title: Fast Check In
text: very fast check in. checked in online. fast efficient luggage check in. in flight service was great.

title: Nice Airline
text: nice airline. comfortable seats and decent leg room. short flight so no food. checked it online, but could not drop off luggage the night before as our flight was at 7 am.

title: Good Service and Good Value
text:
Good service. Good choice of movies. good wine, which was complimentary. seats were comfortable and leg room was decent.

staff were friendly..

title: Good Indian Food - Reasonable Price
text:
good indian food. very reasonable prices for lunch. have a buffet with 6 or 7 selection for $11.95 for lunch.

service was very good.

title: Good Selection of Special Roll
text:
good service. lots of specialty rolls. most are some variation of dynamite roll.

good sushi. reasonable price

title: Amazing View
text:
great place to visit. amazing view of Paris.

get there early or there will long line ups to get up the elevator.

you have to take the elevator to the second floor and change to another elevator to go to the very top.

if you decide to go to the very top, be prepared for long line ups to get on the elevator from the second floor up and also for getting down to the second floor. Very top floor is also very cramped. I would not do it again.

if you want to save some money take the stairs up to the 1st or second floor. it is not that bad.

glass bottom deck is not that impressive. you could hardly see through it.

also good to go at night. they light up the tower and its very nice. no need to go to the top of the tower. you can picnic in the park below and have some wine. people sell wine.

title: Amazing Art
text:
great museum.

get there early or you'll be waiting in line ups.

if you want to see the Mona Lisa, go to it first thing in the morning or else there will lots of people and you can't get a good look.

plan ahead, as there is so much to see.

title: Excellent Food and Settiing
text:
Wine Food Market is setup like a market. The food is fresh. They make it right there. Most tables are communal so you share the table with others. Gives you a chance to meet others.

Pizza are thin crust and brought to you on cedar plank. Very nice meat and cheese plates, salads and of course wine.

you can even shop next door at their grocery store.

title: Nice Architeture
text: Old Town Square is busy with tourists. Great architecture and nice cafe/bars. From the top of the Astronautical clock you get a great view of the city.

title: Tourist Heaven
text: Charles Bridge is full of street vendors and open to only pedestrians. You can take this to the Prague Castle side of town.
